content:
ICustomPluralizationMapping Interface

Definition

Represents a collection of the singular and plural forms of words.

In this Article

public interface ICustomPluralizationMapping

Methods

AddWord(String,String)

Adds singular and plural forms of a word to the ICustomPluralizationMapping object.

public void AddWord (string singular, string plural);
singular
String

The singular version of the word added to the ICustomPluralizationMapping object.

plural
String

The plural version of the word added to the ICustomPluralizationMapping object.
